mapper.select: SELECT Cno, Cname, Cpos, course.Tno, Tname, Ctype, Ccredit, Ccapacity, Cremain FROM (course JOIN teacher ON course.Tno = teacher.Tno) WHERE Cno LIKE concat('%', #{cno} ,'%') AND Cname LIKE concat('%', #{cname}, '%') AND Tname LIKE concat('%', #{tname}, '%')
SELECT Cno, Cname, Cpos, course.Tno, Tname, Ctype, Ccredit, Ccapacity, Cremain FROM (course JOIN teacher) WHERE course.Tno = #{tno}
